the red curry is weak and tasteless , the pad thai is stuck together and lumpy , the rice is often overcooked , and the seafood is pretty sketchy .

delicious food , excellent service , and a pretty atmosphere make this a great choice for dinner and the $ 5.99 lunch buffet makes it an even better choice for lunch !
their sushi , kamikaze and other rolls are fresh and well presented .

the dishes offered were unique , very tasty and fresh from the lamb sausages , sardines with biscuits , large whole shrimp to the amazing pistachio ice cream ( the best and freshest i 've ever had ) .
the spicy tuna roll is huge and probably the best that i 've had at this price range .
there is actually space to breathe and the decor sets the tone for an intimate dinner .
i recommend the meatballs and caprese salad and the beans on toast were a wonderful start to the meal !
the restaurant is a bit noisy but that is something that can be overlooked once you sit down and enjoy a great meal
the crust is thin , the ingredients are fresh and the staff is friendly .

my goodness , everything from the fish to the rice to the seaweed was absolutely amazing .
